pull.title: Move nLastTry from CAddress to CAddrInfo
pull.body: No need to define it for every CAddress, as it's memory only anyway.

events.message:
nLastTry is only used for addrman entries

No need to define it for every CAddress, as it's memory only anyway.

rename.from: Move nAttempts from CAddress to CAddrInfo
rename.to: Move nLastTry from CAddress to CAddrInfo

issue.title: Bring PIVX random on par with bitcoin
issue.body:
This issue is dedicated to keeping track of progress for the process of bringing random.cpp file up to the latest bitcoin version. It's related to #643 and aims to keep info on the WIP updated without crowding the PR with "useless" info.

- [X]  Cherry-pick https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/8c1dbc5e9ddbafb77e60e8c4e6eb275a3a76ac12 (https://github.com/PIVX-Project/PIVX/pull/802)
- [x] Merge https://github.com/PIVX-Project/PIVX/pull/643
  - [X] Cherry-pick https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9821 (in https://github.com/PIVX-Project/PIVX/pull/643)
